password_char_number: Password must be at least 8 characters
username_char_number: Username must be at least 3 characters
username_char_max_number: Username must be at most 28 characters
no_ends_whitespace: Username can't start or end with empty space
allowed_signs: Allowed are only letters, numbers and - _ characters
not_yt_link: It is not correct YouTube channel link
not_sc_link: It is not correct SoundCloud link
